unnormalised: Campus hiring remains crucial for talent acquisition, especially from institutions like IIT Delhi. We've seen impressive candidates this year. Focusing on Tier 2 colleges in UP like BBD University is also key. Salary expectations around Rs. 6 LPA seem standard. Let's aim for a "3 Idiots" level of innovation in our recruitment strategy. Schedule interviews before Diwali!
